form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: CERTIFICATE REGARDING DOCUMENTSS REQUIRED BY 22 CFR 4.111(b) WHICH ARE UNOBTAINABLE

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 6.6.60 DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA CERTIFICATE REGARDING DOCUMENTS REQUIRED BY 22 CFR 42.111 (b) WHICH ARE UNOBTAINABLE 1. the undersigned Vice Consul of the United States of America in and for the consular district of BANGKOK, THAILAND have determined that the document(s) indicated below IS (are) unobtainable by CHAREON CHARUKIJPHITTHAYAKUL on applicant for on immigrant visa, for the following reasons: The document(s) is (are) considered to be unobtainable because It (they) cannot be procured without causing to the applicant or a member of his family actual hardship, other than normal delay or inconvenience. He (she) does not wish to attempt to obtan such document(s) from the present Communist or Communist controlled government of his (her) native country. for personal and/or political reasons. There is attached in lieu of the required document(s): (a) A certificate from the appropriate authority showing that in this particular case the missing document was never properly recorded, together with: (b) (describe the secondary evidence and give your reasons for accepting it) BIRTH CERTIFICATE IS NOT AVAILABLE IN CHINA. SUBMITTED THAI CERTIFICATE OF NATURALIZATION AND HOUSE REGISTRATION ATTESTING DATE OF BIRTH. MAY 28 1987 Date Dennis (signature) DENNIS W. MERZ, VICE CONSUL (SEAL) Unobtainable documentation: Birth certificate Police certificate(s) from CHINA Military record Marriage certificate Death certificate Divorce decree (other, describe)
